title: Setup a PPTP VPN connection on Mac OS X Snow Leopard
description:
In my previous tutorial I explained how to setup a PPTP based VPN server on Ubuntu. Now I’ll show you how to configure Mac OS X Snow Leopard to use that VPN connection.
~ Just watch the movie.
How to setup a PPTP VPN connection from Mac OS X 10.6 from Ariejan de Vroom on Vimeo.
Note: You may open port 1723 (TCP) on your router to allow you to connect to your VPN server from the Internets.
